title: Documentary film explores little-known story of the four men who integrated pro football (Virginia Tech ...
text: ( Source : Virginia Tech - Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University ) BLACKSBURG, Va., Oct. 9, 2015 - A documentary about the four men who broke the color barrier in pro football in 1946 will be shown at 7 p.m. on Oct. 28 in the
